name: CCAnimatedTransitioningKit
summary: CCAnimatedTransitioningKit is used to private animate template for opening book animation.
description: CCAnimatedTransitioningKit is used to private animate template for opening book animation. CCAnimatedTransitioningKit 用于提供书籍打开类APP的数据打开动画，该动画提供了完整的动画结构，方便扩展和使用。
